name: template-webpack-babel-typescript
description: Template to use webpack, babel, typescript (and preact)

scripts.test: cd ./src/browser && npm test && cd ../node && npm test
scripts.build: cd ./src/browser && npm run build && cd ../node && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd ./src/browser && npm install && cd ../node && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install

author: Yutaka Yamaguchi
